entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 823,136Chapters: 102/?Kudos: 846

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you‚Äôre pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I‚Äôve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,665Chapters: 15/20Kudos: 712

Summary: You weren‚Äôt looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn‚Äôt looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn‚Äôt ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier‚Äîsomething that almost feels like home.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,885Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 97

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham‚Äôs Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It‚Äôs a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn‚Äôt.
